game.name: NOK
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Get ready to NOK it out of the park with this physics-based sandbox hidden object game! Step into a world where you'll toss your worries aside and dive headfirst into the wild art of furniture flinging.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Get ready to NOK it out of the park with this physics-based sandbox hidden object game! Step into a world where you'll toss your worries aside and dive headfirst into the wild art of furniture flinging.
